summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 FORD MUSTANG. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBERS: 08V082000 (AIR BAGS), 15V319000 (AIR BAGS), AND 16V384000 (AIR BAGS). THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE FOLLOWING DEALERS WERE MADE AWARE OF THE RECALL AND STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE: (1) MCCARTY DANIEL OF BENTONVILLE, ARKANSAS, (2) LOUIS FORD OF FAYETTEVILLE, ARKANSAS, AND (3) SPRINGDALE FORD OF SPRINGDALE, ARKANSAS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND STATED THAT THEY WERE UNSURE IF THE PARTS WERE AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
